mdRecord.dcterms:title: La vie et faits notables de Henry de Valois: Maintenant toute au long, sans rien requerir. : Où sont contenues les trahisons, perfidies, sacrileges, exactions, cruautez & honets de cét hypocrite, ennemy de la religion Catholique
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Boucher, Jean, approximately 1548-1644

Millot, Didier, active 1584-1590
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Chez Didier Millot, demeurant pres la porte sainct Iacques
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Pamphlet has been attributed to Jean Boucher, according to Brunet.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Eighteenth century armorial binding, with the arms of La Marquise de Pompadour. Bookplate of Le Tellier, Marquis de Courtenvaux. Bookseller's label: Pierre Chretien. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 661.
